text: Sections 43-101 to 43-114, 43-116 to 43-118, and 43-120 to 43-128 (except § 43-119) shall not be construed to:
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 27-128.

1973 Ed., § 27-128.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-34, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 43-119.

DC CODE § 43-128

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Interfere with or prevent the disinterment of any body in accordance with § 11-2311; or
Interfere with the disposal of the ashes of bodies which have been cremated.

heading.catch_text: Court-ordered disinterment or disposal of ashes not affected.
